name: CLLocation
desc: The latitude, longitude, and course information reported by the system.

items.name: floor
items.desc: The logical floor of the building in which the user is located.

items.name: horizontalAccuracy
items.desc: The radius of uncertainty for the location, measured in meters.

items.name: verticalAccuracy
items.desc: The accuracy of the altitude value, measured in meters.

items.name: timestamp
items.desc: The time at which this location was determined.

items.name: distance
items.desc: Returns the distance (measured in meters) from the current object's location to the specified location.

items.name: speed
items.desc: The instantaneous speed of the device, measured in meters per second.

items.name: course
items.desc: The direction in which the device is traveling, measured in degrees and relative to due north.
